extracted_information: Brelly's Smart Claims Copilot is an AI-powered software designed for Public Adjusters, Roofers, Contractors, and Homeowners, aiming to boost claim handling efficiency and automate tasks. It is specifically trained on real claims and tailored for Public Adjusters' workflows.

features.name: Smart Claims Copilot
features.description: AI assistant trained specifically for Public Adjusters, Roofers, Contractors, and Homeowners.

features.name: Engineer Report Tool

features.name: Client Update Generator

features.name: Claims Management
features.description: Handles heavy lifting; allows users to analyze engineer reports, summarize policies, and draft powerful communications in seconds.

details: 90-Minute Setup & Strategy Call: Jump right into Brelly with an active claim, workflow setup, AI preferences tailoring, and immediate issue solving.
Weekly Expert-Led Zoom Calls: With Mathew Mulholland for strategies, best practices, and powerful prompts.
Brelly Community on Skool: Connect with peers, get product updates, access expert-level training and resources.
